mision.title: Our mission
mision.paragraph: Provide our customers with a unique gastronomic experience, combining organic and fresh ingredients with carefully crafted recipes, promoting a healthy lifestyle respectful of nature, while offering warm and friendly service.

productos.title: Organic Products
productos.paragraph: We cultivate responsibly, caring for every detail so you enjoy fresh and healthy ingredients in our dishes. Quality and respect for the land define us.

reserva.title: TABLE RESERVATION
reserva.persons_subtitle: Select the number of people attending your reservation
reserva.info_p1: Each reservation must be made for a specific time; there is no time allowance beyond closing time.
reserva.info_p2: You have a 15-minute grace period to arrive; if you haven't arrived after that time, the reservation becomes invalid and the table may be taken.

alerts.incomplete: Please complete all fields before continuing

eventos.title: EVENTS
eventos.description: We offer a full event service where you not only rent the venue but the complete experience.
eventos.contact: Contact us to check availability and organize your event
eventos.bottom: The service is comprehensive and the menu is defined in advance with the client. Disco or decoration not included.

time.no_times: No available times for this date
time.restaurant_closed: Restaurant is closed on this day

hamburguesa.name: Hamburger
hamburguesa.description: Burger, sauce, lettuce, tomato, ham and cheddar cheese

pasta.name: Alfredo Pasta
pasta.description: Fettuccine with Alfredo sauce and parmesan

cesar.name: Caesar Salad
cesar.description: Lettuce, croutons, parmesan and Caesar dressing
